00001 // script.aculo.us builder.js v1.8.1, Thu Jan 03 22:07:12 -0500 2008

00007 
00008 var Builder = {
00009   NODEMAP: {
00010     AREA: 'map',
00011     CAPTION: 'table',
00012     COL: 'table',
00013     COLGROUP: 'table',
00014     LEGEND: 'fieldset',
00015     OPTGROUP: 'select',
00016     OPTION: 'select',
00017     PARAM: 'object',
00018     TBODY: 'table',
00019     TD: 'table',
00020     TFOOT: 'table',
00021     TH: 'table',
00022     THEAD: 'table',
00023     TR: 'table'
00024   },
00025   // note: For Firefox < 1.5, OPTION and OPTGROUP tags are currently broken,
00026   //       due to a Firefox bug
00027   node: function(elementName) {
00028     elementName = elementName.toUpperCase();
00029     
00030     // try innerHTML approach
00031     var parentTag = this.NODEMAP[elementName] || 'div';
00032     var parentElement = document.createElement(parentTag);
00033     try { // prevent IE "feature": http://dev.rubyonrails.org/ticket/2707
00034       parentElement.innerHTML = "<" + elementName + "></" + elementName + ">";
00035     } catch(e) {}
00036     var element = parentElement.firstChild || null;
00037       
00038     // see if browser added wrapping tags
00039     if(element && (element.tagName.toUpperCase() != elementName))
00040       element = element.getElementsByTagName(elementName)[0];
00041     
00042     // fallback to createElement approach
00043     if(!element) element = document.createElement(elementName);
00044     
00045     // abort if nothing could be created
00046     if(!element) return;
00047 
00048     // attributes (or text)
00049     if(arguments[1])
00050       if(this._isStringOrNumber(arguments[1]) ||
00051         (arguments[1] instanceof Array) ||
00052         arguments[1].tagName) {
00053           this._children(element, arguments[1]);
00054         } else {
00055           var attrs = this._attributes(arguments[1]);
00056           if(attrs.length) {
00057             try { // prevent IE "feature": http://dev.rubyonrails.org/ticket/2707
00058               parentElement.innerHTML = "<" +elementName + " " +
00059                 attrs + "></" + elementName + ">";
00060             } catch(e) {}
00061             element = parentElement.firstChild || null;
00062             // workaround firefox 1.0.X bug
00063             if(!element) {
00064               element = document.createElement(elementName);
00065               for(attr in arguments[1]) 
00066                 element[attr == 'class' ? 'className' : attr] = arguments[1][attr];
00067             }
00068             if(element.tagName.toUpperCase() != elementName)
00069               element = parentElement.getElementsByTagName(elementName)[0];
00070           }
00071         } 
00072 
00073     // text, or array of children
00074     if(arguments[2])
00075       this._children(element, arguments[2]);
00076 
00077      return element;
00078   },
00079   _text: function(text) {
00080      return document.createTextNode(text);
00081   },
00082 
00083   ATTR_MAP: {
00084     'className': 'class',
00085     'htmlFor': 'for'
00086   },
00087 
00088   _attributes: function(attributes) {
00089     var attrs = [];
00090     for(attribute in attributes)
00091       attrs.push((attribute in this.ATTR_MAP ? this.ATTR_MAP[attribute] : attribute) +
00092           '="' + attributes[attribute].toString().escapeHTML().gsub(/"/,'&quot;') + '"');
00093     return attrs.join(" ");
00094   },
00095   _children: function(element, children) {
00096     if(children.tagName) {
00097       element.appendChild(children);
00098       return;
00099     }
00100     if(typeof children=='object') { // array can hold nodes and text
00101       children.flatten().each( function(e) {
00102         if(typeof e=='object')
00103           element.appendChild(e)
00104         else
00105           if(Builder._isStringOrNumber(e))
00106             element.appendChild(Builder._text(e));
00107       });
00108     } else
00109       if(Builder._isStringOrNumber(children))
00110         element.appendChild(Builder._text(children));
00111   },
00112   _isStringOrNumber: function(param) {
00113     return(typeof param=='string' || typeof param=='number');
00114   },
00115   build: function(html) {
00116     var element = this.node('div');
00117     $(element).update(html.strip());
00118     return element.down();
00119   },
00120   dump: function(scope) { 
00121     if(typeof scope != 'object' && typeof scope != 'function') scope = window; //global scope 
00122   
00123     var tags = ("A ABBR ACRONYM ADDRESS APPLET AREA B BASE BASEFONT BDO BIG BLOCKQUOTE BODY " +
00124       "BR BUTTON CAPTION CENTER CITE CODE COL COLGROUP DD DEL DFN DIR DIV DL DT EM FIELDSET " +
00125       "FONT FORM FRAME FRAMESET H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 HEAD HR HTML I IFRAME IMG INPUT INS ISINDEX "+
00126       "KBD LABEL LEGEND LI LINK MAP MENU META NOFRAMES NOSCRIPT OBJECT OL OPTGROUP OPTION P "+
00127       "PARAM PRE Q S SAMP SCRIPT SELECT SMALL SPAN STRIKE STRONG STYLE SUB SUP TABLE TBODY TD "+
00128       "TEXTAREA TFOOT TH THEAD TITLE TR TT U UL VAR").split(/\s+/);
00129   
00130     tags.each( function(tag){ 
00131       scope[tag] = function() { 
00132         return Builder.node.apply(Builder, [tag].concat($A(arguments)));  
00133       } 
00134     });
00135   }
00136 }
